What is 45% of 300?
data.explain: 45 * (300/100) = 135! !Quick way to find answer from options is! !50% of 300 is 150 so 45% of 300 should be less than 150! !So, it may be 149 or 135!149 is very close to 150 which is not possible! !Hence, 135 is correct answer.

data.question: In the first 10 overs of a cricket game the run rate was only 3.2 What should be the run rate in the remaining 40 overs to reach the target of  282?
data.explain: 3.2 * 10 = 32! !After 10 overs score is 32.! !Remaining score = 282 - 32 = 250! !Required rate = 250 / 40 = 6.25 runs/over

data.question: The average of 20 numbers is 0, How many of them may be greater than zero,at the most?
data.explain: Maximum Numbers that can be greater than 0 to maintain total average greater than 0 are 19.

data.question: The average weight of 16 boys in a class is 50.25 kg and that of the remaining 8 boys is 45.15 kg.Find the average weights of all the boys in the class.
data.explain: ! !In this question weighted average is calculated rather than simple average! !(50.25*16 + 45.15*8)/(16+8) = 48.55

data.question: If the average marks of three batches of 55, 60 and 45 students respectively is 50, 55, 60, what is the average marks of all the students?
data.explain: Weighted average will be more close to the average of that batch which has maximum number of students so aanswer is 54.68! !If you want to calculate it by formula then solution is! !(55*50 + 60*55 + 45*60)/(55 + 60 + 45) = 54.68

data.question: A/B = 2/3. If value of A is 8 What is the value of B?
data.explain: 8/B = 2/3!2B = 24!B = 12! !*In short-cut way We can find 2 is multiplied by 4 to get 8 so if we multiply 3 with 4 we get 12 which is the value b B when value of A is 8.

data.question: If A/B is 2/3 and difference between values of A and B is 10 What is value of B?

data.question: A motorcyclist travels 200 Km in 1 hr. How many minutes if would take him to travel 120 Km?
data.explain: 200 Km distance covered in minutes = 60! !1 Km distance covered in minutes = 60/200 = 3/10! !120 Km distance covered in minutes = (3/10) * 120 = 36 minutes

data.question: 16 men dig a ditch in 10 days. How many men would be required to complete the job in half the time?
data.explain: Double number of men are required to complete the job in half time.

data.question: A bus covers a distance of 60 Km in 1.5 hr. How far it would travel in half hour.
data.explain: Distance covered in 1.5 hr = 60! !Distance covered in 1 hr = 60/1.5 = 40 Km! !Distance Covered in 0.5 hr = 40 * 0.5 = 20

data.question: 15 men were hired to plough a piece of land in 10 days. How many more men will be required to do the same job in 3 days?
data.explain: x/15 = 10/3! !x = (10/3)*15! x = 50.! !So more number of men required = 50-15 = 35

data.question: 35 Kg of spinach costs Rs. 28. How many Kg of spinach can be bought for Rs. 16?
data.explain: Amount of spinach which can be bought in Rs. 28 = 35 kg! !Amount of spinach which can be bought in Rs. 1 = 35/28 = 5/4 Kg! !Amount of spinach which can be bought in Rs. 16 =(5/4)*16 = 20 Kg

data.question: 15 weavers can weave some length of cloth in 1 hr. 24 minutes. How many more weavers are required to do the same job in 60 minutes?
data.explain: x/15 = 84/60! !x = (84/60)*15 = 21! !So 21 - 15 = 6 more weavers are required to do the same job in 60 minutes.

data.question: At a particular time shadow of a pole 40m long is measured to be 30m. If the length of a plaza is 200m then how long would the shadow be at about the same time?
data.explain: Shadow of 40m pole = 30m! !Shadow of 1m pole = 30/40m! !Shadow of 200m plaza = (30/40)*200 = 150m

data.question: If one third of the staff at school are teachers find the ratio between teachers to non-teachers.
data.explain: ratio of teachers = 1/3! !ratio of non-teachers = 2/3! !Ratio of teachers to non-teachers = (1/3) * (3/2) = 1/2

data.question: John's fail to pass ratio in mathematics test is 5/2. In how many tests did he pass if total tests conducted were 42?
data.explain: Pass ratio = (2/7)*42 = 12

data.question: In a class the ratio of boys to girls is 1/3. What percent of students are girls?
data.explain: Percentage of girls in class = (3/4)*100 = 75%

data.question: A cigarette case is full of cigars and cigarettes, probability of a cigarette is 8/15. What is the ratio of cigars to cigarettes.
data.explain: In 15 cigars and cigarettes there are 8 cigarettes So ratio between cigars and cigarettes is 8/7. Which means there are 8 cigarettes and 7 cigars.

data.question: At an educational trip of a school ratio of boys to girls students was 4/5. how many students were on the tour?
data.explain: Data is insufficient for this problem. But we can find the answer from the options. As 4 + 5 = 9, So answer should be multiple of 9 to fullfil the condition of 4/5 ratio.

data.question: In a box ratio of DVD to VCD is 2/3. Which of the following cannot be the total number of CD's in the box?
data.explain: As 2+3 = 5, So total number of CD's must be multiple of 5.! !In the options all are multiple of 5 except 11! !So 11 is the correct answer.

data.question: Price of a mobile phone is Rs. 8,000. A man has enough money to purchase 3 mobiles. How many mobile can he purchase if the price is reduced by Rs. 2000?
data.explain: Minimum amount of money that he has = 8,000 * 3 = 24,000! !If price is reduced to 6,000, he can purchase 24,000/6,000 = 4

data.question: 30 men can complete a work in 30 days how long will 20 men take to complete the same amount of work?
John can read 8 pages of a book in 7 minutes, how long will he take to read 40 pages?
data.explain: 40/8 = 5! !As pages are increased 5 times. So minutes will also increase 5 time.! !7 * 5 = 35
